AT.name: Mario™ Strikers Charged Football
AT.description: In diesem Nachfolger von Mario Smash Football musst du per Wii-Fernbedienung und Nunchuk deine Fähigkeiten unter Beweis stellen, um in Ballbesitz zu kommen, unhaltbare Tore zu erzielen und mit dem Torwart Glanzparaden zu zeigen. Neben Mario sind auch noch viele weitere berühmte Nintendo-Charaktere mit von der Partie, die die Rolle des Mannschaftskapitäns übernehmen. Du kannst dir dein Team aus beliebten Figuren zusammenstellen, bevor du in einem der zahlreichen Modi des Spiels dein fußballerisches Können demonstrierst.

AU.name: Mario™ Strikers Charged Football
AU.description: In this follow-up to Mario Smash Football, you use your skills with the Wii Remote and Nunchuk to win the ball, score unstoppable goals and take control of the goalkeeper to perform spectacular saves. Mario is joined by other famous Nintendo characters who take on the role of captain. Then select a host of popular teammates to make up the rest of the team, before competing in one of the game's many modes.

BG.name: Mario™ Strikers Charged Football
BG.description: In this follow-up to Mario Smash Football, you use your skills with the Wii Remote and Nunchuk to win the ball, score unstoppable goals and take control of the goalkeeper to perform spectacular saves. Mario is joined by other famous Nintendo characters who take on the role of captain. Then select a host of popular teammates to make up the rest of the team, before competing in one of the game's many modes.

BE.name: Mario™ Strikers Charged Football
BE.description: Dans cette suite de Mario Smash Football, utilisez votre habileté grâce à la télécommande Wii et le Nunchuk pour obtenir le ballon, marquer des buts de folie, prendre le contrôle du gardien et réaliser des arrêts spectaculaires. Mario est rejoint par de nombreux personnages célèbres de Nintendo, et tous peuvent endosser le rôle de capitane. Sélectionnez ensuite les meilleurs équipiers pour former votre équipe, avant de participer à l'un des nombreux modes que propose le jeu.

ES.name: Mario™ Strikers Charged Football
ES.description: En esta continuación de Mario Smash Football, pondrás en práctica tus habilidades con el mando de Wii y el Nunchuk para hacerte con el balón, marcar goles imparables y controlar al portero para hacer espectaculares paradones. A Mario se le unen otros famosos personajes de Nintendo que asumen el papel de capitán. Selecciona uno y completa el equipo con otros personajes populares antes de competir en uno de los muchos modos de juego.

IT.name: Mario™ Strikers Charged Football
IT.description: Metti alla prova la tua abilità con telecomando Wii e Nunchuck in questo sequel di Mario Smash Football. Guadagna possesso della palla, metti a segno gol inarrestabili e prendi il controllo del portiere per effettuare parate spettacolari. Seleziona un capitano della squadra formata da Mario e altri celebri personaggi Nintendo, poi completa la formazione scegliendo tra gli altri personaggi e dai inizio alla partita in una delle tante modalità di gioco disponibili.

NL.name: Mario™ Strikers Charged Football
NL.description: In dit vervolg op Mario Smash Football gebruik je je vaardigheid met de Wii-afstandsbediening en de Nunchuk om de bal te veroveren, onstuitbare goals te scoren en, in de rol van keeper, spectaculaire reddingspogingen uit te voeren. Mario wordt bijgestaan door andere beroemde Nintendo-personages, die de rol van aanvoerder op zich nemen. Kies de rest van het team uit allerlei populaire teamgenoten, en strijd in een van de vele spelstanden.

NZ.name: Mario™ Strikers Charged Football
NZ.description: In this follow-up to Mario Smash Football, you use your skills with the Wii Remote and Nunchuk to win the ball, score unstoppable goals and take control of the goalkeeper to perform spectacular saves. Mario is joined by other famous Nintendo characters who take on the role of captain. Then select a host of popular teammates to make up the rest of the team, before competing in one of the game's many modes.

PL.name: Mario™ Strikers Charged Football
PL.description: In this follow-up to Mario Smash Football, you use your skills with the Wii Remote and Nunchuk to win the ball, score unstoppable goals and take control of the goalkeeper to perform spectacular saves. Mario is joined by other famous Nintendo characters who take on the role of captain. Then select a host of popular teammates to make up the rest of the team, before competing in one of the game's many modes.

PT.name: Mario™ Strikers Charged Football
PT.description: Nesta sequela de Mario Smash Football, podes usar as tuas habilidades com o Comando Wii e com o Nunchuk para ganhar a posse de bola, marcar golos imparáveis e assumir o controlo do guarda-redes para executar defesas espetaculares. Várias personagens famosas da Nintendo juntam-se ao Mario e todos podem ser o capitão. Completa o resto da equipa escolhendo um grupo de estrelas e compete num dos muitos modos do jogo.

RU.name: Mario™ Strikers Charged Football
RU.description: В этом продолжении игры Mario Smash Football, вы сможете использовать пульт Wii и Nunchuk для того, чтобы забирать у соперника мяч, забивать сногсшибательные голы и брать под контроль вратаря, чтобы мастерски отбивать голы. К Марио присоединяются и другие известные персонажи Nintendo, которым предстоит испробовать себя в роли капитана команды. После чего вы сможете выбрать других знаменитых игроков для остальных позиций в команде и начать играть в одном из многих режимов игры.
